biz.manex.andaman7.injector.controllers

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.manex.andaman7.injector.controllers.MainController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    The main controller that coordinates the views and performs all the business logic.
    Author:
    Pierre-Yves Derbaix (pierreyves.derbaix@gmail.com)
    Copyright A7 Software (http://www.manex.biz)
    Date: 19/01/2015.

      • searchUsers

        public biz.manex.andaman7.server.api.dto.registrar.AndamanUserDTO[] searchUsers(java.lang.String keyword)
                                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Searches some AndamanUserDTO according to a specified keyword. The search is done on the first value, last value and email address.
        Parameters:
        keyword - the keyword on which the search is based
        Returns:
        a list of found AndamanUserDTO
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • sendCommunityInvitation

                                                                                           java.lang.String[] newCommunityMembers)
        Sends some community invitations.
        Parameters:
        senderDeviceId - the UUID of the sender device
        newCommunityMembers - the list of community members to add
        Returns:
        the RegistrarDTOs of the added community members.

      • sendMedicalData

        public boolean sendMedicalData(biz.manex.andaman7.server.api.dto.registrar.AndamanUserDTO destinationRegistrar,
                               java.util.List<AMIContainer> amiContainers,
                               java.lang.String contextId)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Sends some medical data into a specific AMI container of a specified registrar.
        Parameters:
        destinationRegistrar - the destination registrar
        amiContainers - the AMI container UUID and the AMIs to send
        contextId - the context identifier
        Returns:
        true if the destination registrar is already a member of the source registrar's community, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getAmisFromCsvFile

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAmisFromCsvFile(java.io.File file)
                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a map of AMIs from an CSV file.
        Parameters:
        file - the CSV file
        Returns:
        a map with the TAMI keys as key and the AMI values as value
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the CSV file is not found
